dct_title_s: Slopes Greater Than 25% Portland Metro, Oregon 1998
dct_description_sm: This polygon data layer represents slopes greater than 25% for Portland Metro, Oregon in 1998. The dataset was originally published by the Metro Data Resource Center in February 2001.[Area with a slope equal to or greater than 25 percent (12 degrees).]
